EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-10-23-Community Survey.ES-2018-08-03-Survey Invite Targeted.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 Amazon Gift Card for 3 Minute Survey |2018 Community Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://tinyurl.com/ybh6u9tl]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At Turbonomic, we're always striving to bring the best-in-class technology and resources to help you solve complex challenges. To help us better serve you - we need your feedback.
We know you're busy, so here's our offer to you. If you complete the 3-minute 2018 Community Survey <[[https://tinyurl.com/ybh6u9tl]]>, you'll receive a $10 Amazon gift card.
Take Survey Now <[[https://tinyurl.com/ybh6u9tl]]>
At the end of the survey, let us know <[[https://tinyurl.com/ybh6u9tl]]> if you'd like to see how 2,000 customers leverage workload automation to assure performance, lower cost, and maintain compliance. You'll receive an additional $50 Amazon gift card for completing a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer.
We look forward to hearing from you!
Regards, Megan
